item.title: Defending ‚öîÔ∏è
item.description: Attackers need to collect information about the target system first: ping, nmap. Countermeasures: record traffic look for suspicious activity use a host scanner and keep track of all the PCs withing your network.

item.title: Incident Response Process
item.description: Phases: Preparation, Detection & Analysis, Containment, Eradication & Recovery, Post Incident Activity. Event vs Incident. IDS alert may be considered as an event before it’s confirmed.

item.title: Threat Hunting And Intelligence
item.description: Threat Intelligence - ??? Security Intelligence - The real-time collection, normalization, and analysis of the data generated by users, applications, and infrastructure that impacts the IT security and risk posture of an enterprise

item.title: Threat Landscape
item.description: 2020 Ransomware attacks are becoming more common. The amout of scanning and CVE-2019-19781: Citrix Application Delivery Controller.
